rukus.text: My nie create heaven zem everything them v vain Such je the myslienka z those disbelieve! Therefore woe do those disbelieve; they suffer Hell
My treat those verit lead righteous zivot mat rad my treat those commit zly zem? My treat righteous mat rad my treat the zlomyselny
This bol scripture my sent nadol ona bol sacred -perhaps they zrkadlit its verses Those possess inteligencia berie heed
Do David my granted Solomon; dobre obedient servant
dni he became preoccupied dobry horses night fell
He potom said ja enjoyed latka things inak than ja enjoyed kult moj Lord sun bol ist
Bring them chrbat. bid zbohom he rubbed ich noha krk
My thus put Solomon test my zehnat him vast latka wealth he steadfastly submitted
He said Moj Lord forgive mna grant mna kingship never attained by ktokolvek inak! Ona bol Grantor
My answered jeho prayer committed zranit jeho disposal pouring dazo wherever he chudoba
This bol our provision ona; ona dat generously withhold limits
He zasluzit honorable position us nadherny abode
